targets.query:
from(bucket: "ha_events")
  |> range(start: -5m)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["unit_of_measurement"] == "W")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "state")
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({r with _value: float(v: r._value)}))
  |> sum()

from(bucket: "ha_events")
  |> range(start: -5m)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["domain"] == "sensor" and r["unit_of_measurement"] == "Â°C")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "state")
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({r with _value: float(v: r._value)}))
  |> mean()
  |> yield(name: "avg")

from(bucket: "ha_events")
  |> range(start: -5m)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["domain"] == "sensor" and r["unit_of_measurement"] == "Â°C")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "state")
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({r with _value: float(v: r._value)}))
  |> max()
  |> yield(name: "max")

from(bucket: "ha_events")
  |> range(start: -5m)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["domain"] == "sensor" and r["unit_of_measurement"] == "Â°C")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "state")
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({r with _value: float(v: r._value)}))
  |> min()
  |> yield(name: "min")

from(bucket: "ha_events")
  |> range(start: -5m)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["domain"] == "sensor" and r["unit_of_measurement"] == "%")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => contains(value: r["entity_id"], set: "humidity"))
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "state")
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({r with _value: float(v: r._value)}))
  |> mean()

from(bucket: "ha_events")
  |> range(start: -5m)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["domain"] == "weather")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "state")
  |> last()

from(bucket: "ha_events")
  |> range(start: -24h)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["domain"] == "sensor" and r["unit_of_measurement"] == "Â°C")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "state")
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({r with _value: float(v: r._value)}))
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 1h, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> group(columns: ["entity_id"])

from(bucket: "ha_events")
  |> range(start: -24h)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["unit_of_measurement"] == "kWh" or r["unit_of_measurement"] == "W")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "state")
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({r with _value: float(v: r._value)}))
  |> group(columns: ["entity_id"])
  |> sum()

from(bucket: "ha_events")
  |> range(start: -24h)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["unit_of_measurement"] == "W")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "state")
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({r with _value: float(v: r._value)}))
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 1h, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> sum(column: "_value")

from(bucket: "ha_events")
  |> range(start: -5m)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["domain"] == "sensor")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["unit_of_measurement"] == "Â°C" or r["unit_of_measurement"] == "%")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "state")
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({r with _value: float(v: r._value)}))
  |> mean()
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({r with _value: if r._value > 20.0 and r._value < 25.0 then 100.0 else 50.0}))

from(bucket: "ha_events")
  |> range(start: -24h)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["unit_of_measurement"] == "kWh")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "state")
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({r with _value: float(v: r._value) * 0.12}))
  |> sum()

from(bucket: "ha_events")
  |> range(start: -24h)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["unit_of_measurement"] == "kWh")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "state")
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({r with _value: float(v: r._value) * 0.4}))
  |> sum()
